issue.issue_description: Version 7.0.3 of JIRA is unrecognized by Atlassian Marketplace
some Documentation error
example of issue description with security errors
The 'learn more' link is broken in the 'Exclusion Rules' configuration page. When clicking on it, the user is redirected to an invalid page. There by leading to a 'Page not found' error.

On Advanced Roadmaps for Jira timeline it's possible to see the capacity assigned to a sprint (for Scrum) or iteration (for Kanban). This is visible in the form of a vertical bar representing the work associated to it. There's an early access feature for Advanced Roadmaps for Jira which is enabled by default called Enhanced capacity distribution, If the early access feature Enhanced capacity distribution is ENABLED we do not have the capacity for iterations in the past.
Team data is not correctly invalidated after staged changes done to the plan/scenario are discarded.

The number of issues at capacity insights for Kanban teams will be incorrect in the Advanced Roadmaps plan in case you will disable the 'Enhanced capacity distribution' feature. It will be incorrectly calculated by summing up estimates (days/hours).The issue  is The number of issues in capacity insight for the current Kanban iteration is defined as the sum of estimates (days/hours).Expected Results is  The number of issues in capacity insight for the current Kanban iteration should correlate with an actual number of the issues assigned to a team

The user with only view permission can access the plan setting page and make some configuration changes but cannot save these changes. While trying to save these changes or accessing other options or going back to plan the page is stuck at loading and no error is thrown. An HTTP 401 Unauthorized error is captured on HAR and console log. Expected Results is The user with only view permission should not be allowed to access the plan setting page. The 'cog' icon should only include the 'Get started' and 'Get help' items.

In case you have a custom field of 'User Picker' type added to Advanced Roadmaps for Jira plan then under some circumstances the values of this field will not be included in generated Plan's CSV export. The Issue is  While generating Plan,s CSV export some values of the 'User Picker' custom field(-s) are not included. Expected Results is Generated CSV export should include all appropriate values of the custom fields that are available in the current Plan.

JQL search involving Target start/ Target end are returning incorrect results. Performing a JQL search using 'Target start' or 'Target end' return incorrect results when a customfield of a same name is already present. For example:  'project = 'Project name' AND 'Target start' is EMPTY' returns data with Target start having both EMPTY and non-empty results. Thus the issue is It returns data for both empty Target start date and non-empty. But  The result should contain only rows where Target start is EMPTY

Circular reference using issuesInPlan causes StackOverflowError. issuesInPlan JQL function can cause StackOverflow if this is a circular reference. The stack trace indicates a problem with Jira Advanced Roadmap plugin when a JQL is executed. After that, we saw that all DB connections became busy and this caused Jira to be unavailable. Expected Result should show : Gracefully failed

When user specifies a non-existent Person ID, REST Api should return a 400 error. When making a REST call and the Person ID is specified, the Person is created which leads to confusion that this endpoint can assign an existing Person with a team. 400 error code should be returned instead. Error is Persona is created and ID is not taken into account. Expected Results should show 400 HTTP error code.

Jira guardrails will not send email notification to remaining System Administrators when it encounters errors with one of the recipient. Example situation, Instance has 10 System admin and is configured to send notification for jira.safeguards.issue.comments. When triggered, Jira will attempt to send notifications to these 10 admins individually. If it faces a problem with admin #6, it will no longer send emails to admin 7, 8, 9 and 10. This can be replicated if for example the admin does not have an email address. Expected result is Jira will send to the notification to all admins except for the user without email address.Once it fails to send notification to that user, Jira no longer attempts to send notification to the remaining system admins.

Old closed issues from a deleted Sprint get automatically added to a new Sprint. When a Sprint is deleted from a board, all the closed issues that belonged to that Sprint get automatically added to the next open Sprint that is on the board.Actual behaviorThe issue that was closed from the deleted Sprint has been automatically added to the new Sprint. Expected behavior should be that The issue that was closed from the deleted Sprint should not be added to the new Sprint.
Jira guardrails sends email notifications to inactive user or system administrator

FindOnBoard.jspa?sprintId link is extremely slow and fails to load. Post upgrade to Jira 9, /secure/FindOnBoard.jspa link is extremely slow and fails to load, that is  after clicking the link present in 'Completed sprints' from 'edit issue' section, it navigates to  to /secure/FindOnBoard.jspa?sprintId. Thus the Expected Results is that Loading of board should load faster and successful
MS Teams integration documentation missing a step for Jira 9.x versions. Our current documentation doesn't reflect additional steps needed by versions 9.x+ to configure MS Teams with Jira.

Add Tomcat9w in windows section depending on Jira version in adding startup parameters guide. Windows section in the below guide states to use tomcat8w for setting Jira parameters in Windows, while this is correct for Jira 8, for Jira 9 the executable is tomcat9w. Thus the problem is that Only tomcat8w is listed. Expected  Results is that The article should differentiate between the executable version depending on Jira version.

Workflow dropdown text stop working if we re-assign the issue back to logged in user in same session. In a workflow, when you set the condition 'Only the assignee of the issue can execute this transition.' in every transition of a workflow in a project. For any issue for that project when you assign an issue to any other user than logged in user. Later change the assignee to the logged in user. The Workflow drop down text stop coming on the screen.
When navigating to the endpoint to check sync data, the page is broken.. Expected Results is The endpoint show the latest sync data.

When accessing empty kanban board rest/greenhopper/1.0/xboard/work/transitions.json retuns 400 error. Thus the problem is that Boards are displayed without visual regressions. Expected Results should be that There are no 400 HTTP errors in the console.

Dragging the sprint footer does not always track issues correctly. ested on 8.20.0 and 9+ (so through deduction it affects at least all 8.20+ version). Have some sprint (not started yet) in the backlog view. Have some issues in the backlog.The Error is that The position of the footer might not reflect the state of which issues are to be moved and The scope of issues to be moved to the sprint is reflected by the gap between issues. Expected Results should be that The current position of the dragged footer should indicate the range of the issues to be moved to the sprint.

Users with Manage Sprint permission but no Edit Sprint permission can not manage a sprint on a board pulling from multiple projects. User granted the Manage Sprint permission but not the Edit or Start/Stop Sprint permission, can not edit a sprint. The problem is Edit Sprint is grayed out, and user can not Start or Stop the sprint. Expected Results is that User should be able to Edit and Start/Stop the sprint with the Manage Sprint permission.

Creating an issue using the 'Create Issue in Epic' button causes surplus webhook events. The issue looks similar to the Jira Cloud Bug,  which is marked as 'Closed' with Resolution status 'Timed out'. Expected Results should be Creating a Story under Epic will generate an issue-created event.

The JQL query 'Epic name is empty' is not working and always returns 0 result. When using the following JQL query to search for Epics for which the 'Epic Name' is empty, no results are returned. Expected results should be that The search should returns all the Epic for which the 'Epic Name' field is empty.

REST call to third-party plugin fails Jira 9.x. A Jira 9.x with the ALM Octane plugin installed failed to load the plugin on the view issue screen. However, the plugin loads fine in the side panel view or when the issue key is clicked in the view issue screen. Thus the problem is that The REST call is not made only when the Issue is viewed from the Board on a full page and Attaching the HAR files for further review. Expected Results is to Make the REST call on all pages while the issue is viewed.

Version menu not showing status category progress blocks (bars). Project versions do not show the status blocks due to CSS problems The div with CSS class aui-group status-category-blocks is hidden even though it's calculated correctly and the users can't see the statistics graph

Users with View Read-Only Workflow can't see 'View workflow' when not able to transition the issue. Users with View Read-Only Workflow can't see 'View workflow' when not able to transition the issue. This started on Jira 9.x when the new issue view moved the 'View workflow' to the status list drop-down.Expected Results is that View Read-Only Workflow permission should at least make available the menu option 'view workflow', instead it shows permission errors when the user can't transition the issue from the current status, making this permission tied to 'transition issue' permission.

Epic under an Epic. Expected Result is that Epic shouldn't be present under another Epic in Issues in Epic section, Epic cannot have another Epic under issues in Epic section. But Actual problem is Epic still be present in issues in Epic section under an Epic.

When editing Filter Results gadget drag-dropping fields moves them to the right.Starting from Jira 9.0 version for both Jira DC & Server. When editing the 'Filter Results' gadget in the dashboard, a drag-drop of fields under 'Columns to display' moves the fields to the right.Actual Results is The drag-drop of fields moves toward the right .

Shared with drop-down missing in Search Dashboards page. There is an issue where the Shared with drop-down box is missing from the Manage Dashboards > Search Dashboards page, preventing users from selecting a value, such as Anyone on the web, Group, Project, and User.Expected Results is that Drop-down box should appear on the page with the ability to select from the list of values. Error is that An empty space exists to the right of the Shared with attribute.
High CPU usage during query execution in DVCS plugin. Expected Results is to Smooth and fast query result

Update Jira CDN documentation.docs do not mention known issue with CDN possibly misbehaving during ZDU upgrade (when cluster is in mixed mode). The recommended action is to disable CDN before the upgrade and enable it after the cluster is in stable state. Expected Results is We have instrustion in the document on what to do with CDN when performing ZDU.

Work log activity entries are showing 'Date Started' timestamps in a relative way. Starting from Jira 9.0, Work log activity entries are showing 'Date Started' timestamps in a relative way ('just now', 'yesterday' etc.) instead of showing absolute date value. This behaviour differs from the previous user experience (Jira 8.22.x/8.20.x) and makes it hard to clarify the exact 'Date Started' time specified during the creation of the work log entry while reviewing the details of these items. Additional context Unlike other activity entries where shown timestamp is the same as the entry's created date, the work log behaves differently — it shows a value specified as 'Date Started' while logging the entry. For all other activity entries (like for example comments) you could hover the mouse cursor over the timestamp and check for the absolute timestamp value in the tooltip. For work log entries it will also show the correct absolute timestamp value of created date, but the tooltip doesn't show the value for the 'Date Started' timestamp. Actual Results is that The Work log activity entries are showing 'Date Started' timestamps are shown relatively and there is no easy way to figure out their actual value. Expected Results is that The Work log activity entries should show a 'full' (absolute) timestamp (like it was before 9.0) or provide an easy option to figure it out (an additional entry in the tooltip would be helpful here)

Projects gadget keeps loading indefinitely.The 'Projects' gadget (sometimes) keeps loading indefinitely when displaying 3+ projects. This is an intermittent behaviour as it gets resolved by refreshing the page a few times.Expected Results is that The projects to be displayed consistently after every refresh . Actual Results is that Sometimes the gadget keeps loading indefinitely

Update 'Supported Platforms' documentation. The document Supported Platforms for pretty much all Jira versions states the following in regards to Oracle databases:JDBC Driver: For all Oracle versions, use the JDBC 19.3 (ojdbc8) driver listed here. This is the driver we’re using to test Jira with Oracle.However, the Oracle JDBC 19.3 driver is no longer available on the linked page. It is still available at this link. Thus the problem is The linked page no longer lists version 19.3 of the driver. The  expected output should be It is possible to download the Oracle JDBC 19.3 driver from the page linked in our documentation.

External System Import using CSV populates deleted fields . Expected Results: When doing the Mapping Fields, Jira should not let you choose fields that were removed from the project. Actual Results he Jira Admin can import a CSV file containing fields that were removed from the project.
Fields that are set as hidden in the field configuration still appear as valid options in the 'Issue Detail View' within the board settings in Software projects
When using Groovy scripts to update object attributes with unique values, if the script is ran multiple times in short period of time, there is an 'ValidationInsightException' message.
nsight Reports scheduled to run Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Advance (CRON expression) stop synchronising randomly. Expected Results : Reports should be synced. Actual Results: Reports are not synced
The print label for a timestamp attribute will display differently(without the correct formatting) when viewing it from the new object view - UI Bug
The print label for user attributes will display the user key instead of the user's name when printing from the new object view

On Customer Portal, Insight Custom Field will display values that belong to the Preset value set for another Customer Portal context. Expected Results: In Project A we do not have a customer selected nor hidden, so no application should be displayed.Actual Results :Applications for the customer1 we set on Project B are displayed on Project A

When importing Insight objects using AWS, if the user is syncing with too many accounts and combine with many regions, the test configuration will show as spinning forever on UI which prevents from going to the next step. This is due to the backend API is timing out due to testing too many AWS connections at the same time

Object type Developer are not able to create/edit object when the select type attribute is selected. Expected Results: The user should be able to select the value for an attribute and create the objects as all the necessary permissions are given to the user. Actual Results : The user is getting the ‘unknown’  error response

When the user uses basic object search in an objetType that contains for example 5000 objects and it contains 10 different names distributed among these 5000 objects, it would only return 3 names when filtering on name. Expected Results: all the  names should be displayed in the result
Insight CSV import ignore text surrounded by <> characters when target attribute is of type TextArea
Insight Automation to create issue will not work when there is a required custom field with default value. Issues are not created by automation
Creating a test environment for Jira product documentation doesn't mention required updates if CDN is enabled on production

Wrong information about PAT implementation on Jira and Confluence on public document.While Bitbucket and Bamboo have their own PAT implementation, Jira and Confluence share the same code base through a plugin.Although there's no in-product UI to allow user authentication with a token, the solution doesn't filter out requests from a browser

A Confluence page with an Advanced Roadmaps Plan macro shows a baseURL warning popup every time you visit the page.  You will see a baseURL warning popup when the page loads. Based on your network topology, the message can differ

The logic that decides whether a mention notification should be sent from a Jira Service Management issue when a user does not have application access (no license) is different, depending if batched notifications are enabled or not.Expected Results: The mentioned users should receive a notification saying that someone mentioned them in the ticket, as it's the case when Batched Notifications are disabled. But Actual Results No notification is sent to the user

If the user's language is Japanese, an error occurs when trying to enter the date and time using the Date Time Picker. The error  - Invalid date format. Please enter the date in the format 'dd/MMM/yy h:mm a'

Jira data pipeline may still report a job a started even if it's not running anymore. This scenario impacts the ability of running subsequent jobs, even though it wasn't previously on status of failure . Data pipeline should be able to identify a job isn't running anymore, marking it as incomplete, and allowing new jobs to start. Expected Results Jira identifies the previous data pipeline job isn't running anymore and properly starts the new job. But Actual Results The previous data pipeline job status is still reported as started and the new one is reported as failed

When users authenticate on Jira, this information should be added as new events on the audit log when full coverage is enabled for the Security category Requests made with personal access tokens (PAT) for REST API won't create a new entry on the audit log. Expected Results A new User login successful event is logged as part of the REST API request. Actual Results No new event is added.It seems the personal access token code isn't firing a user login event. This makes auditing inconsistent when personal access tokens (PAT) are used.

Jira full reindex process does not terminate when it encounters a relevant failure. Expected Results The full reindex fails as soon as the first error occurs. Actual Results The full reindex continues untill 100% and then will be reported as completed with errors. On large instances, an administrator may wait for hours only to know the reindex failed because of an issue that occurred on the initial minutes

Lazy loading of iframe gadgets on dashboard is broken. Expected Results The content of iframe gadget should be loaded only when the gadget is within the viewport. Actual Results The content of all iframe gadgets is loaded on page load, regardless of their position on a page.

Search indexing documentation suggests in the Re-indexing a single project section that Project admins are able to reindex a project. This information is not true and only users with Jira admin permission (or Jira system admin) can see this option under the project settings

Mail notifications from the Comment Safeguards are not being sent to the System administrators if the Outgoing email address is not matching a user in Jira.Expected Results Notifications are triggered and the System admins receive the notification about the limit being exceeded. Actual Results: Couldn't match mail server 'from' address to an existing Jira user. Mail notification will not be sent

Division Slider in Search Results screen doesn't work. Expected Results The sidebar should move accordingly there by expanding or contracting the Listed issues section.  Actual Results Instead, the sidebar doesn't move, it causes a flickering issue sometimes but the issues pane doesn't expand or contract and stays the same
Audit log events product documentation has wrong information about Field Configuration events

MS Teams integration with Jira fails and displays a blank white screen when clicked on Authorize in Jira option. Expected Results  MS Teams should be successfully integrated with Jira.Actual Results MS teams integration with Jira fails with below error snippet: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource

Inconsistent behavior between Jira UI and API response when hiding the field Linked Issues The Jira UI and the REST API end point show conflicting/inconsistent results when the Linked Issues field is set to hidden in the Field Configuration

Incorrect smart value mentioned in the Smart Value documentation for A4J DC. In the Smart Value documentation for Automation For Jira Data Center,  the syntax to iterate over the Fix Versions from the changelog smart value does not work. Instead of 'ixVersion', we should use 'Fix Version'
Active Objects StringLenght's limitations for Oracle. Expected Results Active Objects should map varchar2 to 4000 characters Actual Results Active Objects should map varchar2 to 450 characters
The method getApplicationLinks() on the ApplicationLinkService will only return application links of type internal. Where iit should return both internal and external links

Under some conditions, the default security level is not respected on the quick create issue screen, when switching between projects and issue types. Expected Results The 'Security Level' should be set to the default level configured in the scheme.  The 'Security Level' is set to 'None'
View workflow menu item in transitions dropdown is not keyboard accessible

During the installation of Jira 9.0.0 on Linux platforms using the Linux 64 bit installer, the installer prompts the user to overwrite the file tcnative-1.dll.Expected Results The installer should proceed without prompting to overwrite any existing files, especially given that .dll files are not typically present or needed on Linux systems. Actual Results The installer prompts with the following message: The file already exists. Would you like Setup to overwrite it?
When accessing Jira for the first time on the browser, an error appear on the browser console: TypeError: e is null . This error looks harmless and Jira works as expected.

Some region names overlap names and titles in Jira Credits. Expected Results Watch the credits rolling nicely from left to right. There should be sufficient gaps between regions, Region names shouldn't be overlapping people names or their titles Actual Results They start overlapping

In the Connecting Jira applications to MySQL 8.0 product document we have a step to add autoCommit=false to the mysql configuration. this was wrongly added to the document as it's only suggested for MS SQL Server
Product document to run Jira as a service on Windows wasn't updated for Tomcat 9

Index snapshot silently fails if parent directory doesn't exist.Expected Results Jira will automatically create in snapshots directory if it doesn't exist and snapshot should successfully be created/saved.Actual Results Jira doesn't create the necessary directory and the snapshot will not be created/saved

Unable to add Assignee without Browser Project permission . Expected ResultsThe reporter should be able to add an Assignee while he creating the ticket.Actual Results  The Jira server was contacted but has returned an error response.
On Jira 9.x if user mouse hovers over the options under the 'Export' button the highlight/background behaviour works only in one direction

Configuring linked issues in Kanban board layout displays other links instead of only issue links . Confluence links in particular are not displayed properly. The correct behavior would be to either only display issue links like before or display the Confluence link page name correctly
The full reindex process has slowed down significantly for some customers. This is due to extra operations performed during reindexing that improve index correctness

he improvement of 'Activity tabs improvements' in Jira 9.0 is available for Server license regardless of license types. However the release notes say 'Activity tabs improvements' is only for DC with a 'DATA CENTER' label.

Loading all history entries is very slow on issues with many of them - on the tested instance there were ~4000 history entries associated with a single issue.  The content needs a lot of time to load. Most of this time is waiting for the response from the server
Trying to edit a user with a Chinese/Korean characters in their name/username results in an error

Issue status tooltip on Issue View shows HTML markup if you mouse-over during page load . After loading an issue or refreshing the page while on the Issue view, if you quickly mouse-over the Issue Status you'll be presented with the HTML markup instead of the rendered tooltip
Date picker doesn’t appear when creating an issue from an Administrative page. Reproduced in Jira Service Management 5.6. This also applies to the Date Picker Time custom field as well
Unable to attach the same file consecutively using browse and select . File is not attached again even  you cancel the first attachment

Pressing enter in empty Watchers field throws HTTP 405 – Method Not Allowed error.Expected Results When the field 'add watchers' does not have a value assigned then  pressing enter, the issue view page screen to be reloaded
Jira is affected by CVE-2022-42890 & This affects the Batik library from v1.0 - v1.15 Jira 9.0.0 uses Batik v1.14
The dashboard gadgets do not align correctly after a collapse or a refresh. To make them appear properly the gadgets need to be kept expanded and then hit a refresh

The history tab does not reflect changes made to the inward/outward settings of issue links. Expected results The link direction in both the Issue Links panel and the History tab should match. They should both say 'is blocked by' .Actual results The history tab is not reflecting the change we made (it still shows 'blocks'), while the Issue Links panel is reflecting the change and is showing 'is blocked by'

When Jira is upgraded from 8.x to 9.x and the first node starts up for the first time, it performs the database upgrade and adheres to the jira-config.properties config. However, if the node's restarted, this second startup kicks-off a full reindex regardless

The page links don't work in the User Picker and Group Picker popup. If the number of users found in the search is higher than the number from Users per page, the results will be split into multiple pages. When clicking on any page other than the 1st page, nothing happens, making it impossible to switch between pages to search for users not shown in the 1st page

Inconsistency with the colour of 'To Do' statuses between the status button and the transition dropdown list. The workflow statuses and transitions were all moved to a button in the issue view page. That new design introduced an inconsistency with the colour of statuses that belong in the 'To Do' category, between the status button and the transition dropdown list

Description of workflow transition does not appear in hover tooltip. The description of the workflow transition does not appear in the hover tooltip.The name of the transition appears in the hover tooltip instead.Expected Results is that The description of the workflow transition appears in the hover tooltip

Plugins system timeout, causing Jira startup failure .The issue is intermittent. Upon restart a number of system plugins failed to be enabled. Jira fails to start.JIRA-Bootstrap ERROR  , Creation Timer ERROR. Expected Results is that Jira starts

Some plugins cannot be enabled after restart.  The issue is intermittent. Upon restart some plugins are not enabled. One cannot enable them from UPM. Expected Results is that Jira application starts without errors

When searching by statusCategory QueryComponent!Jql.jspa returns 400 because of 'jqlTooComplex'  Issues are searched correctly but  In the console, you can find that request fails with 400 HTTP code . Expected Results is that There are no HTTP requests that return a 400 error code as it is for any other JQL clauses

Jira rest api allows assigning of a security level from a unrelated issue security scheme. Jira rest api to edit issues (PUT /rest/api/2/issue/issuekey), allows assigning of a issue security level from an unrelated issue security scheme associated with a different project.The unrelated issuesecurity level from the unrelated issue security scheme for the project gets assigned. Afterwards, the issue cannot be viewed, cannot be updated even via rest, cannot be deleted either, all due to permission issues. Expected Results is that The unrelated security level should not be assignable to the issue. And The issue should be viewable

Analytics state (enabled/disabled) cannot be changed.Analytics cannot be enabled/disabled in Jira 9.4.0.This problem is not reproducible in Jira 8.20. Analytics go back to enabled.Expected Results are that Analytics keep being disabled.

The Dashboards Search doesn't work as expected when searching for multiple terms searches.Since the search engine searches the Dashboard's names and descriptions, it brings many different results from the wanted one.Expected Results should be that The more details you give to the search engine, the more refined and assertive the results should be, just like in the Agile Boards search

licking add comment before the Jira page loads, causes the text box to open as a new page.f you load into an issue in a Software or Business project, and click 'Add Comment' before the page fully loads, this will cause the Add comment text to open as a new page, Once a comment is added it takes you back to the issue as normal. If you wait for the page to load fully, then it will create the add comment text box at the bottom of the page as normal. The main problem is The Add comment goes to a new page.  Expected output should be that the add comment box to always created at the bottom of an issue, instead of a new page

Team Calendars cannot display the assignee of the Jira Issue event when the Jira Description field contains a newline character on Jira 9.x. After upgrading Jira 9.x, the assignee of the Jira events cannot be displayed on the Team Calendars if the Jira Description field contains a newline (shift+enter while the Description field is on 'Visual' mode, not new paragraph by using just enter).The 'Assignee' field is displayed as 'Unassigned' even though it is assigned to the user. There are no logs or any faulty indications in the Confluence logs

Team Calendars cannot display Jira Issue events when there are special characters in the Jira Description on Jira 9.x. This problem occurs when the issue description area contains an enter character followed by a semicolon.Actual Results is that The event is not visible on the Team Calendars UI.Expected Results is that The event should be displayed on the Team Calendars for the chosen 'Due Date' while creating the Jira Story issue

jira.comment.collapsing.minimum.hidden is no longer working Expected Result is that When you have jira.comment.collapsing.minimum.hidden=4 (default value), the result should be: The first 8 comments will show without collapsing; and When the 9th comment is added, Jira shows 5 comments on screen and 4 are collapsed
Behavior Inconsistencies when the Jira Mail Handler fails to create an issue or add a comment
Fileviewer -previewing pdf attachment & performing zoom in/out action ,giving console errors

Unbatched mode - Visiting Issue View page with multiple page reloads breaks comment editor (RTE) & attachment section with console errors. Attachment section - User unable to attach and Add comment editor - focus indicator missing , unable to use RTE toolbar
Disabling RTE & visiting issue view page, doesn't load project sidebar in dev.mode (batching off). Project sidebar doesn't load
Minimized gadgets still consume a whole space of expanded gadgets on the dashboard. After refreshing the dashboard page the Minimised gadgets still consume the whole space of expanded gadget

Issue DELETEs not replicated across cluster indexes. Some sub-tasks may still be present on some indexes. But its is expected that  The issue and all sub-tasks should be removed from the DB and all indexes (across all nodes)

Upgrade from 8.x to 9.x with large number of comments/worklogs may fail. Error running original upgrade task . It is expected that the  Upgrade task should finish in the expected time (~1min per 1M issue/comments/worklogs)

End bracket shown in the dialog of the move-issue process only for custom field radio button. When there is a required custom field radio button in the project and the custom field radio button has a default value set an end bracket ')'appears Expected Results is that The first option of a custom field radio button should contain the end bracket ')' before it

Adding a comment from 'All' tab does not update the UI. The new comment does not appear in the activity tab content once posted. Expected Results is that the New comment should appear in the activity tab content once posted

Custom comment sorting not being saved.  the way comments are sorted to show the newest comments first.We can change the order using the 'Newest first/Oldest first' button at the top right of the comments, but that is reverted really quickly if the user adds a new comment on any ticket during the same session.Actual Results is that Comments revert back to original Newest first sorting on all tickets. But  Expected Results is that Comments on all tickets are still sorted by Oldest first

Unable to calculate missing data in index when getting last issue update time returns null. Could not calculate the duration of time where index recovery/catchup needs to be applied! Expected Results is that Jira tries to update the index with missing data it compares the last issue update time in the local index to the last update time in the issue version table. When Jira contains an uncorrupted index (local index during start-up time or index restored from snapshot) it should be able to successfully calculate the missing time range and update the local index
Jira shows unnecessarily alarming stack trace when reindexing thread is expectedly disabled. Expected Results is that No alarming log messages with stack traces occur int the logs during the process

Error 405 received after updating Index Recovery Settings Error 405 was received after updating Index Recovery Settings and returning to the previous IndexAdmin.jspa if previously the <recover> button was pressed with invalid content. Expected Results is that The new schedule time was saved. The page returns to the main page IndexAdmin.jspa
Sprints missing from Boards. Sprint A is missing from Board B.Thus causing a data inconsistency in the system.  Expected Results is that Sprint A should show up in Board B

View Issue: edit elements should be changed from span to button. At the moment, the edit elements are <span>s with role='button', they should be changed to native <button> elements. Beware, this might lead to some broken tests. Expected Results is that The edit elements should be native buttons

'Add' button in comments is greyed out when an attachment is added to the comments. When an attachment is added in the comments (in text, not visual mode), the 'Add' button is greyed out unless a 'Space' or some character is added on the comment box.
When using the translate option for a custom field, Jira throws a HTTP 405 - Method Not Allowed. Expected Results is that Page renders normally and performs the translate

Comments are not automatically updated once they are posted. After updating the JIRA application to version 9.0.0, The comments are not updated once they are published.Comments should be automatically updated once they are posted

Gadgets overlap after collapse and refresh. The dashboard gadgets do not align correctly after a collapse or a refresh. To make them appear properly the gadgets need to be kept expanded and then hit a refresh. Expected Results is that Gadgets to be aligned properly according to the space available.

Dashboard with Gadget : Non descriptive link text provided for colour links.Non-descriptive link text is provided for colour links in the gadgets menu present in the system dashboard.In the menu for the gadgets in the System dashboard, the colour links have inappropriate link text provided such as 'Color 1', 'Color 2', etc. to the colour link icons. When running multiple Remote Agents on the same server using the same user, a race condition exists where multiple Docker Login tasks can overlap and the wrong credentials can be used.n limited scenarios where the docker login tasks are executed in a very short period of time the credentials may get overwritten before being referenced by the task, or when a task ends it performs a docker logout and removes any credentials from the system. Task fails with invalid credentials error.

Generating Java code using OpenAPI spec does not match the JSON response.Expected Results: The JSON response and the XML definition are matching.  Actual Results:       There is a mismatch between them meaning the spec requires manual intervention to make it correct.
O(n) complexity in DeploymentAggregator. where n is number of versions related to a JIRA ticket.For each related deployment version, Bamboo runs 2 additional queries

Bamboo Elastic Instance fails to mount EBS snapshot volume if an Instance Store volume is present on the EC2 instance.Expected Results: Bamboo should be able to mount the EBS volume regardless of the presence of other non-EBS volumes in any order

The scheduler worker thread pool can completely block with a hung TCP connection waiting for an HTTP CONNECT response from an outbound proxy because there's no SocketTimeout.Expected Results: Socket timeout should be hit and an exception should be thrown. Actual Results: Thread sits waiting indefinitely until the TCP connection is closed or Bamboo is restarted. Each scheduler thread gets put into an infinite wait each time a Stash Polling Quartz job is run while waiting for cache population. Eventually, the whole thread pool is starved and no scheduled jobs run.

All releases of a deployment are loaded at once, causing slowness  is that When loading the Releases page of a deployment project or running a new deployment and selecting 'Promote existing release to this environment', Bamboo runs SQL queries that retrieve the details and information about all the releases tied to that deployment. In large data environments where releases have not been purged over time, the long list of releases to be loaded can cause slowness/sluggishness.

HTTP Compression for Artifacts cannot set to Disable for specs plan is that HTTP Compression for Artifacts cannot set to Disable when using specs to manage plan.For plans created manually, HTTP compression can be set to Disable by unchecking the Compression option in the Artifact definition.

When a branch is marked for deletion by a repository event, it enters a grace period before being permanently deleted by Bamboo. During this interim, the branch remains listed in the Bamboo specs scan dropdown menu, allowing users to select it for scanning operations. This unintended behavior can lead to scan failures as operations are attempted on branches that are in the process of being removed.

The Program Tracking Report displays Multi-Team Dependencies that match the PI filter, but will ignore the Program Filter if applied, showing Multi-Team Dependencies that are not associated with the select program in any way, but are related to the selected PI.Expected result is that Multi-Team Dependencies respect the Configuration Bar filters.Actual result is that Multi-Team Dependencies display in the Program Tracking report so long as they match the selected PI, ignoring the Program filter.

Forecast - 'Hide Empty Rows and Columns' removes all entries.On the Forecast page, when trying to hide Empty Rows by enabling the toggle 'Hide Empty Rows and Columns', it removes all the columns even if they are not empty.Expected result is that Empty Rows and Columns get hidden.

The JA API that creates the mapping for the projects doesn't validate if the projectId used on the POST call is already mapped for that connector, allowing the creation of duplicate ids in JA and resulting in state mapping screen not loading.Expected result is that No duplicated Jira Project ids are returned in the API call.

Duplicate users shown in team allocations, sprints, and organizational hierarchy.When preparing or editing the members assigned to a sprint, users appear multiple times for the same sprint. In some cases, users have more than 3 entries in the same sprint.Those users with multiple entries cannot be deleted or removed from the sprint without leveraging the workaround listed below. In some teams, users that are inactive in Jira Align, are allocated and assigned as team members in sprints.
